sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>good luck</radical> radical and the <kanji>good luck</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: For <kanji>good luck</kanji>, you keep special <reading>kits</reading> (<ja>きつ</ja>) in your <reading>kitch</reading>en (<ja>きち</ja>). These kitchen kits contain good luck charms.
readingInfo: Your good luck kitchen kits have charms that say things like, "good food," "good company," and "good luck not cutting off your fingers with kitchen knives."
